update ss_class_set

mapper.select: SELECT * from ( ( SELECT scs.id AS id, scs.title AS title, scc.title AS category_title, scs.create_time AS create_time, scs.modify_time AS modify_time, scs.merchant_id AS merchantId, '' as logoUrl, 1 AS class_type FROM ss_class_category scc, ss_class_set scs WHERE scc.id = scs.category_id AND scc.available = 1 AND scs.available = 1 AND scs.merchant_id =#{merchantId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT sci.id AS id, sci.title AS title, scc.title AS category_title, scc.create_time AS create_time, sci.modify_time AS modify_time, sci.merchant_id AS merchantId, sci.logo_url as logoUrl, 2 AS class_type FROM ss_class_category scc, ss_class_info sci WHERE scc.id = sci.category_id AND sci.class_set_id IS NULL AND sci.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND scc.available = 1 AND sci.available = 1 ) ) t ORDER BY t.modify_time DESC

SELECT * from ( ( SELECT scs.id AS id, scs.title AS title, scc.title AS category_title, scs.create_time AS create_time, scs.modify_time AS modify_time, scs.merchant_id AS merchantId, '' as logoUrl, 1 AS class_type FROM ss_class_category scc, ss_class_set scs WHERE scc.id = scs.category_id AND scc.available = 1 AND scs.available = 1 AND scs.merchant_id =#{merchantId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT sci.id AS id, sci.title AS title, scc.title AS category_title, scc.create_time AS create_time, sci.modify_time AS modify_time, sci.merchant_id AS merchantId, sci.logo_url as logoUrl, 2 AS class_type FROM ss_class_category scc, ss_class_info sci WHERE scc.id = sci.category_id AND sci.class_set_id IS NULL AND sci.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND scc.available = 1 AND sci.available = 1 ) ) t where t.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') ORDER BY t.modify_time DESC
